imgCopyright: Photo by Jaredd Craig on Unsplash
name: Article: Free Knowledge Resources on the Web
text: Are you searching for great resources of knowledge on the internet? At best for free? During the last weeks, I have created a list with my favorite learning platforms which I love to share with you.

imgCopyright: Photo by mahdis mousavi on Unsplash
name: Open-Source: TicTacToe Reinforcement Learning
text: Tic-Tac-Toe environment for OpenAI Gym to train an intelligent agent using Reinforcement Learning. I also added a demo using Q-Learning.

imgCopyright: Photo by Victor Freitas on Unsplash
name: Open-Source: OpenAI Gym Starter
text: A boilerplate repository to help you get started with creating a new OpenAI gym environment quickly. Was created in reference to the official documentation from OpenAI.

name: Open-Source: Contributing to ml5.js
text: ml5.js is a JavaScript library for machine learning based on Tensorflow.js. I contributed to it by discovering a bug and helping to fix it. Additionally, I programmed an interactive example for Linear Regression using a Neural Net within the browser, which is now part of the official examples.

imgCopyright: Photo by Helena Lopes on Unsplash
name: Slack Group: Inspiring Tech-Writers
text: Currently planning a Slack-Group for people willing to inspire others with technology and mind-changing ideas. The Slack-group would serve as a place for ideas, help and motivation. If you would be interested in joining, feel free to contact me on Twitter.

imgCopyright: Photo by Kon Karampelas on Unsplash
name: Tutorial: E-Mail Signature
text: Tutorial on how to build an email signature from scratch, that works with every email client. Only HTML and CSS is used, no external hosting needed!

imgCopyright: Photo by Denys Nevozhai on Unsplash
name: List: Whitepapers Autonomous Driving
text: Collection of Whitepapers from the current leaders in the industry about the challenges and choices of Autonomous Driving.
